channel.title: Stress on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Stress on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: More 96 core benchmarks
item.description: Yesterday I spent some time with a 96 core ARMv8 server. On day two I figured out a couple more things about that server. First and foremost, the extended path of installing Docker on the server I chronicled yesterday ended up being much easier today. A simple apt-get install docker.io did the right thing to bring Docker 1.12.1 into the system. Don’t do apt-get install docker on Ubuntu; you’ll get “docker - System tray for KDE3/GNOME2 docklet applications” instead.
